verses.text: Save \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* waters are come \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w unto|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* soul.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* sink \w in|strong="H5315"\w* deep mire, where \w there|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* no standing: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am come \w into|strong="H4325"\w* deep \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, where \w the|strong="H3588"\w* floods overflow \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.
I am weary \w with|strong="H4325"\w* my crying; my throat \w is|strong="H4325"\w* dried: mine eyes fail while I wait \w for|strong="H4325"\w* my God.

\w They|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* hate \w me|strong="H7121"\w* without \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cause|strong="H7121"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* more than \w the|strong="H7121"\w* hairs \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w mine|strong="H3615"\w* head: \w they|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* would cut \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w off|strong="H3615"\w*, being \w mine|strong="H3615"\w* enemies wrongfully, \w are|strong="H5869"\w* mighty: \w then|strong="H7121"\w* \w I|strong="H5869"\w* restored \w that|strong="H7121"\w* \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H5869"\w* took \w not|strong="H5869"\w* \w away|strong="H3615"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w thou|strong="H7725"\w* knowest \w my|strong="H7725"\w* foolishness; \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* sins \w are|strong="H2600"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hid \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w thee|strong="H8130"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* wait \w on|strong="H4480"\w* thee \w be|strong="H3808"\w* ashamed \w through|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* hosts: \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w seek|strong="H3808"\w* thee \w be|strong="H3808"\w* brought \w to|strong="H3045"\w* dishonour \w through|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Israel.

Because \w for|strong="H6960"\w* \w thy|strong="H1245"\w* sake \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* borne \w reproach|strong="H3637"\w*; \w shame|strong="H3637"\w* \w hath|strong="H6635"\w* covered \w my|strong="H1245"\w* face.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w become|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stranger \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* brethren, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w an|strong="H5375"\w* alien \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* motherâ€™s children.

\w For|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* zeal \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thine house \w hath|strong="H1121"\w* eaten \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w up|strong="H1121"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* reproaches \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* reproach thee \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w fallen|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* wept, \add and chastened \add*\w my|strong="H5921"\w* soul \w with|strong="H1004"\w* fasting, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* sackcloth \w my|strong="H1961"\w* clothing, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* proverb \w unto|strong="H5315"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w sit|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* gate talk \w of|strong="H4912"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*; \w and|strong="H8242"\w* \add I am \add*\w the|strong="H5414"\w* song \w of|strong="H4912"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* drunkards.

But \w as|strong="H3427"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* me, \w my|strong="H8354"\w* prayer \w is|strong="H8179"\w* unto thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w an|strong="H3427"\w* acceptable time: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w thy|strong="H8354"\w* mercy, answer me \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* truth \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w thy|strong="H8354"\w* salvation.

Deliver \w me|strong="H6030"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* mire, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H6256"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w* \w not|strong="H6256"\w* sink: \w let|strong="H6256"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6030"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* hate \w me|strong="H6030"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* deep waters.

Let \w not|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5337"\w* \w waterflood|strong="H4325"\w* overwhelm \w me|strong="H8130"\w*, \w neither|strong="H5337"\w* let \w the|strong="H5337"\w* \w deep|strong="H4615"\w* swallow \w me|strong="H8130"\w* up; \w and|strong="H4325"\w* let \w not|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5337"\w* pit shut \w her|strong="H8130"\w* mouth upon \w me|strong="H8130"\w*.

Answer \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* lovingkindness \w is|strong="H6310"\w* good: \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* tender mercies turn thou \w unto|strong="H4325"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* hide \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6437"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* servant; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* distress; \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w* speedily.

Draw nigh \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* soul, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* redeem \w it|strong="H3588"\w*: ransom \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w mine|strong="H6440"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6887"\w*.

Thou knowest \w my|strong="H6299"\w* reproach, \w and|strong="H7126"\w* \w my|strong="H6299"\w* shame, \w and|strong="H7126"\w* \w my|strong="H6299"\w* dishonour: mine adversaries \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w all|strong="H1350"\w* before thee.

\w Reproach|strong="H2781"\w* \w hath|strong="H3639"\w* broken \w my|strong="H3605"\w* heart; \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* am \w full|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* heaviness: \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* looked \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w some|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3045"\w* \w take|strong="H3045"\w* pity, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w*; \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* comforters, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w found|strong="H3045"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* gave \w me|strong="H4672"\w* \w also|strong="H3820"\w* gall \w for|strong="H6960"\w* \w my|strong="H4672"\w* meat; \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w my|strong="H4672"\w* thirst \w they|strong="H3808"\w* gave \w me|strong="H4672"\w* vinegar \w to|strong="H3820"\w* drink.

\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* table before \w them|strong="H5414"\w* become \w a|strong="H3068"\w* snare; \w and|strong="H7219"\w* when \w they|strong="H6772"\w* are \w in|strong="H5414"\w* peace, \add let it become \add*\w a|strong="H3068"\w* trap.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* eyes \w be|strong="H1961"\w* darkened, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* see \w not|strong="H1961"\w*; \w and|strong="H6440"\w* make \w their|strong="H6440"\w* loins continually \w to|strong="H1961"\w* shake.

Pour \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w thine|strong="H7200"\w* indignation \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* let \w the|strong="H7200"\w* fierceness \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w thine|strong="H7200"\w* anger overtake \w them|strong="H7200"\w*.
Let \w their|strong="H5921"\w* habitation \w be|strong="H2195"\w* desolate; let none dwell \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* tents.

\w For|strong="H3427"\w* they persecute \w him|strong="H1961"\w* whom \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* hast smitten; \w and|strong="H3427"\w* they tell \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* sorrow \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* whom \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* hast wounded,
Add iniquity unto \w their|strong="H3588"\w* iniquity: \w and|strong="H5221"\w* let \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* come into \w thy|strong="H5608"\w* righteousness.

\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* blotted \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* book \w of|strong="H5921"\w* life, \w and|strong="H6666"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* written \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6666"\w*.

\w But|strong="H6662"\w* I am poor \w and|strong="H6662"\w* sorrowful: let \w thy|strong="H4229"\w* salvation, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, set \w me|strong="H5973"\w* \w up|strong="H6662"\w* \w on|strong="H3789"\w* high.

\w I|strong="H3444"\w* \w will|strong="H3444"\w* praise \w the|strong="H7682"\w* name \w of|strong="H3444"\w* God \w with|strong="H6041"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* song, \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w will|strong="H3444"\w* magnify \w him|strong="H7682"\w* \w with|strong="H6041"\w* thanksgiving.

\w And|strong="H8034"\w* \w it|strong="H8034"\w* \w shall|strong="H8034"\w* please \w the|strong="H1984"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* better than an ox, \add or \add*\w a|strong="H3068"\w* bullock that hath horns \w and|strong="H8034"\w* hoofs.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* meek \w have|strong="H3068"\w* seen \w it|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w glad|strong="H3190"\w*: ye \w that|strong="H3068"\w* seek after \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, let \w your|strong="H3068"\w* heart live.

\w For|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* heareth \w the|strong="H7200"\w* needy, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* despiseth \w not|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* prisoners.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H3068"\w* earth \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H8085"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* seas, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3068"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* moveth therein.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* save Zion, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* build \w the|strong="H3605"\w* cities \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Judah; \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H8064"\w* abide \w there|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H3220"\w* possession.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* seed \w also|strong="H3063"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w servants|strong="H8033"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*; \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* love \w his|strong="H3588"\w* name \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w therein|strong="H8033"\w*.
